name: Doki Doki Literature Club! Character File
summary: A CHR file is a game file used by Doki Doki Literature Club!, a visual Anime novel for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It stores "Easter egg" information that is referenced by the game. The name of the file, which may be monika.chr , natsuki.chr , sayori.chr , or yuri.chr (characters in the game) indicates the Easter egg content stored in the file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Team Salvato Doki Doki Literature Club!
Used by programs that can access system fonts

macos.display_name: Team Salvato Doki Doki Literature Club!
